body.p: includes the following tools for viewing runtime information, configuration details, and performance metrics of virtual machines and cloud VM instances.

note.p: To monitor a cloud VM, the Compute Instance Monitoring plugin must be enabled and running on the instance. See the documentation for more details.

li.p: VM Activity Overview. Displays an overview of performance metrics for all running virtual machines and cloud VM instances.
Session Information Dialog. Displays configuration and runtime information for the selected guest system or cloud VM.
